thread.title: Four former Wildcats to compete in NBA Skills Challenge
thread.title_full: Four former Wildcats to compete in NBA Skills Challenge

title: Four former Wildcats to compete in NBA Skills Challenge
text:
Four former Wildcats to compete in NBA Skills Challenge Four former Wildcats will compete in the NBA Skills Challenge at All-Star Weekend in New Orleans. Slot to Kentucky Links 
Karl-Anthony Towns won't defend his crown in the NBA Skills Challenge, but there's still a pretty good chance a former Wildcat wins it. 
Four former Kentucky players-- Devin Booker , DeMarcus Cousins , Anthony Davis and John Wall --will all compete in the Taco Bell Skills Challenge at NBA All-Star Weekend in New Orleans, the league announced Thursday. 
Get the latest UK news sent straight to your inbox with out EMAIL NEWSLETTER â€” NBA (@NBA) February 3, 2017 
Towns edged out Boston Celtics guard Isaiah Thomas to win last year's competition, which also included Cousins and Davis among others. 
The NBA Skills Challenge includes a timed obstacle course where one must display ball handling, passing and shooting skills in a tournament style format. 
Other competitors include Thomas, Gordon Hayward , Joel Embiid and Kristaps Porzingis . 
Cousins, Davis and Wall will also participate in this year's NBA All-Star Game. Author
